document.full_text: sanofi's candidate drug lyxumia, or lixisenatide, added to basal insulin, significantly reduced blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes patients and also led to a loss in weight, data published on tuesday showed.
document.title: sanofi's diabetes drug cuts blood sugar, weight
lines_and_colors: sanofi's candidate drug lyxumia, or lixisenatide, added to basal insulin, significantly reduced blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes patients and also led to a loss in weight, data published on tuesday showed.
